greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle T(n,k) = n AND k, 0<=k<=n, bitwise logical AND, read by rows.
comment: A080100(n) = number of numbers k such that n AND k = 0 in n-th row of the triangular array.
link: Rick L. Shepherd, Rows n=0..500 of triangle, flattened
mathematica: Column[Table[BitAnd[n, k], {n, 0, 15}, {k, 0, n}], Center] (* _Alonso del Arte_, Jun 19 2012 *)
program: a080099 n k = n .&. k :: Int
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jan 28 2003
